title.rendered: Amazon Brand – Eono iPhone Charger Cable [Apple MFi Certified] Fast Charging Lightning Cable Lead, 1M

content.rendered:
Amazon Brand – Eono

A way of life model with a mission to create a variety of slicing-edge tech merchandise, permitting individuals to benefit from a large number of various actions. We imagine revolutionary merchandise must be accessible, whereas providing excellent worth for cash.

Strong Durability

The connector defend has been seamlessly laser-welded and the lightning connector is ready to stand up to hundreds as much as 15kg with out incurring injury. In addition, the cable is ready to stand up to hundreds as much as 50kg and has been examined to bend to 95-levels greater than 20,000 instances.

【Certified Safe】Eono iphone charger cable (Update silver terminal) has handed strict MFI, CE, FCC, UL certification, the superb high quality ensures the protection of charging whereas charging at most pace.
【Fast Charging】The charger lead Apple’s unique terminal and sensible chip licensed by MFI. It helps extremely-quick charging, which could be 40% sooner than cables with out the unique Apple chip. No warning message pops up.
【Strengthen Durability】Lightning cable use fastidiously adjusted gentle TPE materials can resist tangles, the terminal has been examined assist hundreds as much as 40kg and withstands over 15,000 bends Lasts 10x longer than different cables.
【Perfect Compatibility】Fully suitable with Apple gadgets with an 8-pin lightning port equivalent to iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/SE 2020/XS/XS Max/X/XR/8/7/6 Plus/6s/5s/5c/5 iPad iPod in addition to the newest iOS system.
【What you get】Eono by Amazon 1M lightning cable with 24 months guarantee, quick and pleasant 24*7 customer support.
